Cliffjumper ran towards Iron Raptor and Prowl, then bent over and panted
heavily, his injurys taking their toll on him. "We're getting
slaughtered out here, any orders?" he asked, as his wounds began to
spark up. He then looked around at all the silent Maximals, "Whoa, you
guys look like you need a recharge" he suggested.
